description.en-US: Convert the data format reported by SDK into the data format in the data warehouse
description.zh-CN: 把SDK上报的数据格式，转换成数据仓库中的数据格式

description.en-US: Derive OS, device, browser information from User Agent string from the HTTP request header
description.zh-CN: 从 HTTP 请求标头的用户代理（User Agent)字符串中获取操作系统、设备和浏览器信息

description.en-US: Derive location information (e.g., city, country, region) based on the request source IP
description.zh-CN: 根据请求源 IP 获取位置信息（例如，城市、国家、地区）

description.en-US: Convert the GTM server data format into the data format in the data warehouse
description.zh-CN: 把GTM服务的数据格式，转换成数据仓库中的数据格式

description.en-US: When the user launches an app the first time after installation
description.zh-CN: 当用户安装后第一次启动应用程序时

description.en-US: When a user first open the app or a user returns to the app after 30 minutes of inactivity period
description.zh-CN: 当用户首次打开App或用户在 30 分钟不活动后返回App时

description.en-US: When new screen is opens
description.zh-CN: 当新的屏幕打开时

description.en-US: When user navigates away from current screen and the screen is in focus for at least one second
description.zh-CN: 当用户离开当前屏幕并且屏幕处于焦点状态至少一秒钟时

description.en-US: Every time the app goes to visible
description.zh-CN: 每次App变为可见时

description.en-US: Every time the app goes to invisible
description.zh-CN: 每次App变为不可见时

description.en-US: When the addUserAttributes() or setUserId() API is called
description.zh-CN: 当调用 addUserAttributes() 或 setUserId() API 时

description.en-US: When the app crashes
description.zh-CN: 当应用程序崩溃时

description.en-US: When the app is updated to a new version and launched again
description.zh-CN: 当App更新到新版本并再次启动时

description.en-US: When device operating system is updated to a new version
description.zh-CN: 当操作系统更新到新版本时

description.en-US: Event name is invalid or user attribute is invalid
description.zh-CN: 事件名称无效或用户属性无效时

description.en-US: When new page is opens
description.zh-CN: 当新的页面打开时

description.en-US: The first time a user reaches the bottom of each page
description.zh-CN: 用户第一次到达每个页面的底部时

description.en-US: Each time a user performs a site search
description.zh-CN: 每次用户执行站点搜索时，根据 URL 查询参数的存在来判断

description.en-US: Each time a user clicks a link that leads away from the current domain
description.zh-CN: 每次用户单击将其带离当前域名（或配置的域名列表）的链接时

description.en-US: When user shares the mini program to others
description.zh-CN: 当用户分享微信小程序时

description.en-US: When user adds the mini program to favorites
description.zh-CN: 当用户收藏微信小程序时

description.en-US: The screen ID
description.zh-CN: 屏幕ID

description.en-US: The previous screen name
description.zh-CN: 上一个屏幕名称

description.en-US: The previous screen ID
description.zh-CN: 上一个屏幕ID

description.en-US: The previous screen unique ID
description.zh-CN: 上一个屏幕唯一ID

description.en-US: Last page url
description.zh-CN: 前一个页面URL

description.en-US: Last page title
description.zh-CN: 前一个页面标题

description.en-US: The first screen view event in a session is 1, others is 0
description.zh-CN: 会话中的第一个屏幕浏览事件该值为 1，其他则为 0

description.en-US: The first screen view event in a session is 1, others is 0
description.zh-CN: 会话中的第一个屏幕浏览事件该值为 1，其他则为 0

description.en-US: The timestamp of the previous _screen_view event
description.zh-CN: 上一个 screen_view 事件的时间戳

description.en-US: The timestamp of the previous _screen_view event
description.zh-CN: 上一个 screen_view 事件的时间戳

description.en-US: The previous page last engagement milliseconds
description.zh-CN: 上个屏幕最后一次用户参与事件时长的毫秒数

description.en-US: The previous page last engagement milliseconds
description.zh-CN: 上个屏幕最后一次用户参与事件时长的毫秒数

description.en-US: The previous page last engagement milliseconds
description.zh-CN: 上个屏幕最后一次用户参与事件时长的毫秒数

description.en-US: When it is the first _app_start event after the application starts, the value is true
description.zh-CN: 当应用程序启动后第一个 _app_start 事件时，值为 true

description.en-US: The message of exception
description.zh-CN: 异常信息

description.en-US: The stack details of exception
description.zh-CN: 异常堆栈信息

description.en-US: The version of previous app
description.zh-CN: 上一个应用版本

description.en-US: The version of previous operating system
description.zh-CN: 上一个操作系统版本

description.en-US: Error code
description.zh-CN: 错误代码

description.en-US: Error message
description.zh-CN: 错误信息

description.en-US: The keyword name
description.zh-CN: 搜索参数名称

description.en-US: The search content
description.zh-CN: 搜索内容

description.en-US: The content of class in tag <a>
description.zh-CN: 标签 <a>中class里的内容

description.en-US: The domain of href in tag <a>
description.zh-CN: 标签 <a>中href里的域名

description.en-US: The content of id in tag <a>
description.zh-CN: 标签 <a>中id里的内容

description.en-US: The content of href in tag <a>
description.zh-CN: 标签 <a>中href里的内容

description.en-US: If the domain is not in configured domain list, the attribute value is true
description.zh-CN: 如果该域不在配置的域名列表中，则属性值为true

description.en-US: Traffic medium. Use this attribute to store the medium that acquired user when events were logged. Example: Email, Paid search, Search engine
description.zh-CN: 流量媒介，存储事件记录时获取用户的媒介，例如：电子邮件、付费搜索、搜索引擎

description.en-US: Traffic name. Use this attribute to store the marketing campaign that acquired user when events were logged. Example: Summer promotion
description.zh-CN: 流量名称，存储事件记录时获取用户的营销活动，例如：夏季促销

description.en-US: Traffic source. Name of the network source that acquired the user when the event were reported. Example: Google, Facebook, Bing, Baidu
description.zh-CN: 流量来源，事件报告时获取的网络来源的名称，例如：Google, Facebook, Bing, Baidu

description.en-US: Install source, it is the channel for app was downloaded
description.zh-CN: 安装源，app下载的渠道

description.en-US: The session ID
description.zh-CN: 会话ID

description.en-US: The session start timestamp
description.zh-CN: 会话开始时间戳

description.en-US: The session duration
description.zh-CN: 会话持续时间

description.en-US: The session number
description.zh-CN: 会话编号

description.en-US: Last off-site link
description.zh-CN: 最近一次站外链接

description.en-US: Last off-site domain name
description.zh-CN: 最近一次站外域名

description.en-US: The screen name
description.zh-CN: 屏幕名称

description.en-US: The screen unique ID
description.zh-CN: 屏幕唯一ID

description.en-US: The page title
description.zh-CN: 页面标题

description.en-US: The page url
description.zh-CN: 页面URL

description.en-US: The time (in microseconds, UTC) at which events are recorded on the client
description.zh-CN: 客户端上记录事件的时间（以微秒为单位，UTC）

description.en-US: The currency conversion value of the 'value' parameter of the event (in USD)
description.zh-CN: 事件的“值”参数的货币转换值（以USD为单位）

description.en-US: The platform
description.zh-CN: 平台

description.en-US: Project ID associated with the application
description.zh-CN: 与应用相关联的项目ID

description.en-US: The unique ID assigned to a user through setUserId() API
description.zh-CN: 通过 setUserId(）API分配给用户的唯一ID

description.en-US: The pseudonymous id generated by SDK for the user
description.zh-CN: SDK为用户生成的伪ID

description.en-US: Device brand name
description.zh-CN: 设备品牌名称

description.en-US: Device model name
description.zh-CN: 设备型号名称

description.en-US: Device manufacturer name
description.zh-CN: 设备制造商名称

description.en-US: Device carrier name
description.zh-CN: 设备网络提供商名称

description.en-US: Device network type
description.zh-CN: 设备的网络类型

description.en-US: Operating system type
description.zh-CN: 操作系统

description.en-US: Operating system version
description.zh-CN: 操作系统

description.en-US: Operating system language
description.zh-CN: 操作系统语言

description.en-US: IDFV (only present when IDFA is not collected)
description.zh-CN: IDFV（仅在未收集 IDFA 时存在）

description.en-US: Advertising ID/IDFV
description.zh-CN: 广告 ID/IDFA

description.en-US: Offset from GMT in seconds
description.zh-CN: 与 GMT 的偏移量（以秒为单位）

description.en-US: Browser for users to view content, derived from the User Agent string
description.zh-CN: 用户查看内容的浏览器，从 User Agent 字符串中派生

description.en-US: The version of browser for users to view content, derived from the User Agent string
description.zh-CN: 用户查看内容的浏览器版本，从 User Agent 字符串中派生

description.en-US: Device for users to view content, derived from the User Agent string
description.zh-CN: 用户查看内容的设备，从 User Agent 字符串中派生

description.en-US: The category of device for users to view content, derived from the User Agent string
description.zh-CN: 用户查看内容的设备类别，从 User Agent 字符串中派生

description.en-US: The operating system of device for users to view content, derived from the User Agent string
description.zh-CN: 用户查看内容的设备操作系统，从 User Agent 字符串中派生

description.en-US: The screen width
description.zh-CN: 屏幕宽度

description.en-US: The screen height
description.zh-CN: 屏幕高度

description.en-US: The website viewport width pixel
description.zh-CN: 视区宽度

description.en-US: The website viewport height pixel
description.zh-CN: 视区高度

description.en-US: The website hostname
description.zh-CN: 网站主机名

description.en-US: The continent that reporting events based on IP addresses
description.zh-CN: 基于 IP 地址报告事件的大陆

description.en-US: The sub continent that reporting events based on IP addresses
description.zh-CN: 基于 IP 地址报告事件的子大陆

description.en-US: The country that reporting events based on IP addresses
description.zh-CN: 基于 IP 地址报告事件的国家

description.en-US: The region that reporting events based on IP addresses
description.zh-CN: 基于 IP 地址报告事件的地区

description.en-US: The city that reporting events based on IP addresses
description.zh-CN: 基于 IP 地址报告事件的城市

description.en-US: The latitude that reporting events based on IP addresses
description.zh-CN: 基于 IP 地址报告事件的纬度

description.en-US: The longitude that reporting events based on IP addresses
description.zh-CN: 基于 IP 地址报告事件的经度

description.en-US: The accuracy that reporting events based on IP addresses
description.zh-CN: 基于 IP 地址报告事件的精度

description.en-US: The locale that reporting events based on IP addresses
description.zh-CN: 基于 IP 地址报告事件的地址

description.en-US: Traffic name. Use this attribute to store the marketing campaign that acquired user when events were logged. Example: Summer promotion
description.zh-CN: 流量名称，存储事件记录时获取用户的营销活动，例如：夏季促销

description.en-US: Traffic medium. Use this attribute to store the medium that acquired user when events were logged. Example: Email, Paid search, Search engine
description.zh-CN: 流量媒介，存储事件记录时获取用户的媒介，例如：电子邮件、付费搜索、搜索引擎

description.en-US: Traffic source. Name of the network source that acquired the user when the event were reported. Example: Google, Facebook, Bing, Baidu
description.zh-CN: 流量来源，事件报告时获取的网络来源的名称，例如：Google, Facebook, Bing, Baidu

description.en-US: The package name or Bundle ID of the application
description.zh-CN: 应用程序的软件包名称或 Bundle ID

description.en-US: App ID associated with the application
description.zh-CN: 与应用相关联的 App ID

description.en-US: Store where applications are installed
description.zh-CN: 安装应用程序的商店

description.en-US: Version Name (Android) or short bundle version of the application
description.zh-CN: 应用程序的 versionName（Android）或简短的 bundle 版本

description.en-US: The unique ID assigned to a user through setUserId() API
description.zh-CN: 通过 setUserId(）API分配给用户的唯一ID

description.en-US: Added to the user object for all events. The time (in milliseconds) when the user first opened the app
description.zh-CN: 用户首次打开应用程序或访问站点的时间（以毫秒为单位），在 user 对象的每个事件中都包含此属性

description.en-US: The date when the user first opened the app
description.zh-CN: 用户首次打开应用程序或访问站点的日期

description.en-US: The referer when the user first opened the app
description.zh-CN: 用户第一次打开应用程序时的外链

description.en-US: The first-captured traffic source name
description.zh-CN: 第一个捕获的流量源名称

description.en-US: The first-captured traffic source medium
description.zh-CN: 第一个捕获的流量媒介

description.en-US: The first-captured traffic source
description.zh-CN: 第一个捕获的流量来源

description.en-US: The first-captured channel
description.zh-CN: 第一个捕获的渠道
